title: World Athletics Championships: British trio through in women’s 100m heats, women’s 10,000m final and more – live
summary: John Brewin is providing live updates from the first evening session in Tokyo. The report will cover key moments and highlights from the event. Stay tuned for real-time insights and developments.

title: Brisbane v Gold Coast: AFL 2025 second semi-final – live
summary: The Lions are facing the Suns at the Gabba for a chance to secure a spot in the preliminary final against Collingwood. Geoff Lemon will provide live updates on the match as it unfolds. The outcome is crucial for both teams in the finals series.

title: Arsenal v Nottingham Forest: Premier League – live
summary: Rob Smyth will cover Ange Postecoglou's return as Nottingham Forest takes on Arsenal at the Emirates Stadium. The match marks a significant event for Postecoglou. Fans can look forward to an exciting confrontation between the two teams.

title: Premier League returns with Postecoglou taking Nottingham Forest to Arsenal – matchday live
summary: Tom Bassam highlights the excitement surrounding the Premier League's return, with Arsenal preparing to face Nottingham Forest in a lunchtime match. Fans are eager for the action as the new season kicks off. The upcoming game promises to be an exciting start for both teams.

title: Crowds gather in London for ‘unite the kingdom’ march featuring Tommy Robinson – UK politics live
summary: In March, Britain is set to host its largest far-right rally in decades, featuring speakers from Britain, the US, and Europe. The event highlights a growing trend of far-right activism across the continent. Authorities are likely to increase security measures in response to the anticipated turnout.
